statements: UPDATE network_usage_data SET bytes_sent = 1000 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE network_usage_data SET data_usage = 500 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE capacity_planning SET capacity = 1000.50 WHERE network_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE network_usage_data SET data_usage = data_usage + 100 WHERE user_id = 'c08b99c6-6d5c-4eef-8368-769fe7444990' AND date = '2022-01-15 12:30:00'
UPDATE capacity_planning SET capacity = capacity * 1.2 WHERE network_id = 'f4370c3e-7872-495e-8731-672a3fb51051'
